com.github.triceo.robozonky

Class Investor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.triceo.robozonky.Investor

  • public class Investor
extends Object
    Controls the investments based on the strategy, user portfolio and balance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Investor

        public Investor(ZonkyProxy api,
                BigDecimal initialBalance)
        Standard constructor.
        Parameters:
        api - Authenticated API ready to communicate with the server.
        initialBalance - How much available cash the user has in their wallet.

    • Method Detail

      • invest

        public Collection<Investment> invest(InvestmentStrategy strategy,
                                     Collection<LoanDescriptor> loans)
        One of the two entry points to the investment API. This takes the strategy, determines suitable loans, and tries to invest in as many of them as the balance allows.
        Parameters:
        strategy - The investment strategy to use.
        loans - Loans that are available on the marketplace.
        Returns:
        Investments made in the session.

      • invest

        public Optional<Investment> invest(int loanId,
                                   int loanAmount,
                                   TemporalAmount captchaDuration)
        One of the two entry points to the investment API. Takes a particular loan and invests a given amount into it.
        Parameters:
        loanId - ID of the loan that should be invested into.
        loanAmount - Amount in CZK to be invested.
        Returns:
        Present if investment succeeded, empty otherwise.

        public BigDecimal getBalance()
